name: EggPong
description:
Welcome to the world's greatest cooking competition, Egg Pong!

Gameplay

Try to get the egg ball into your opponent's net! The egg will then go to you. Once you get all the eggs you win!

This game is best played with a friend, but there is also an AI you can play with.

Controls

Player 1: Use the WASD keys. W & S move your pan up and down, and A & D tilt your pan.

Player 2: Use the Arrow keys. Up & Down move your pan up and down, and Left & Right tilt your pan

You can also use a controller for both players

Cracking Eggs

When you hit the egg, it will speed up! When it's too fast, it will break into two! Both the egg shells will then be in play.

Credits

Programming and game design: ColdCalzone (https://coldcalzone.itch.io/)

Art: ColdCalzone, D4yz (https://d4yz.itch.io), Willowblade (https://willowblade.itch.io/)

SFX: DimX

(Note: I've had to set the game to debug due to a game breaking crash, oops.)
